posts.post_content:
This card is repugnantly overrated. He's no waste of paper, of course, but he's not something that's totally unparalelled for its cost like Goyf, Dark Confidant, Stoneforge, JTMS. Some of those cards released at a much lower price than this and are far better in that they're irreplaceable. Not every deck of such type will want to run this, and some will even want to run more specific ETB effects instead. Examples?
  
   
Flashback [Doom Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doom Blade)? Seen it before - [Nekrataal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nekrataal).
  
Flashback [Counterspell](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Counterspell)? Hello, [Mystic Snake](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mystic Snake).
  
[Shock](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shock)? Yeah, [Fire Imp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fire Imp) is cool, I guess.
  
[Innocent Blood](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Innocent Blood)/Edict? [Fleshbag Marauder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fleshbag Marauder) and [Gatekeeper of Malakir](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gatekeeper of Malakir) saw play, didn't they?
  
[Thoughtseize](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thoughtseize)? I suppose it's nice to have some permanency in my [Tidehollow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tidehollow ) Sculler, though I do have to pay a m... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:

Some of those cards released at a much lower price than this and are far better in that they're irreplaceable. Not every deck of such type will want to run this, and some will even want to run more specific ETB effects instead. Examples?

Flashback Doom Blade? Seen it before - Nekrataal.
Flashback Counterspell? Hello, Mystic Snake.
